content.raw: I've just followed the "system setup" instructions on a new installation of of Ubuntu 14.04 and have encountered the same problem.  Missing are: IHMCJavaToolkit:0.9.0, IHMCFootstepPlanning:0.9.0, RobotEnvironmentAwareness:0.2.2, IHMCJavaFXToolkit:0.9.0.  I've still got my previous installation.
